bio: This Yo-kai visits homes asking, "Any brats here?" It's a way of scaring kids into behaving well. Kind of like a reverse Santa.

soultimate.name: For Naughty Brats
soultimate.description: Hit foe with a barrage of hits for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Atk ↑ when attacking, 1% ↑ per hit, lasts 5 seconds.
skill.name: Seeing Red

name: Snartle
